description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and manages theme background.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header element of the application, displays content in a flexible layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Links within the application styled with theme-based colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
